title: 今天早上下雪了
author: SuperXingYu
txt_content:
L Z那里今天早上居然下雪了
太奇怪了。

replies.author: 帅帅的猪
replies.txt_content: 你住哪啊？

replies.author: ybb135788
replies.txt_content: 说不定是某人在抖头皮屑

replies.author: SuperXingYu
replies.txt_content:
帅帅的猪 发表于 2015-10-10 12:48
你住哪啊？
祖国大东北

replies.author: x_chengz
replies.txt_content: 然而我们这边下雨

replies.txt_content: 东北正常...下的大么

replies.txt_content:

东北正常...下的大么
还算不大

replies.txt_content: 表示下雪就08年下了一场
